modName: Black Iron Sword - Red Impression --Now Standalone--
summary: Added a Black Iron Ore texture with a Red Tint Impression on the Blade Edge.
descriptionHtml:
For the full set of Standalone weapons see http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28277


Added a Black Iron Ore texture with a Red Tint Impression on the Blade Edge.

*******************
UPDATE: (13/12/2012)      Officially Standalone, 


CRAFTABLE:      Under Iron
---------------
TEMPERABLE:    Yep


ATTACK:       Roughly 20% Better than Iron Sword counterpart
-----------------

SPEED:         10% quicker strikes
-----------------

VALUE:         Roughly 220 septims   


(It\'s Harder to Forge & Temper, it\'s faster, stronger than an average Iron Ore Sword so it\'s worth more)

Hope you enjoy it guys, 

:)
author: Elgar2389
